string.text: SEARCH FOR THE MYSTERY PEOPLE
Reach the trader

Koval is dead — in saving me, he sacrificed his own life. At any rate, I need to finish what was started. Perhaps I'm close to the truth already. Right now, I'm to track down the local trader, who should help me get in contact with the stalkers that encountered the unknown group... and that group most likely has a part in the professor's disappearance.
Go to Chord's camp
The trader gave me the approximate location of a group of stalkers under the leadership of a Chord, whose help I'll need with the investigation. I should search that area.
OUTWITTED
Follow the mercenaries
Out of the blue, I stumbled onto the stalker I was searching for at the Army Warehouses. In the midst of our conversation, we were taken by mercenaries. I wonder what they want from us?
END OF THE LINE
Talk to Thermite
I managed to escape alive from the underground with Thermite. I should talk to him and head to pick up the things that the mercenaries took from us.
Kill the mercenaries with Thermite
We came out alive. Our objective now is retrieving our possessions, after which we'll unveil the identity of this Thermite and see how he's connected to professor Dubinin.
Kill the mercenaries alone
It's like Thermite vanished into thin air after taking a bullet. I'm sure we'll meet again sooner or later. He has ties to professor Dubinin in one way or another.
Grab the possessions
Time to grab my things and get out of here.
Find the code to the mercenary safe
The safe holding the things is locked. I should check the mercenaries' corpses.
Open the safe
The safe code was on one of the mercenaries' bodies. Now I can grab my things.
UNPAID DEBT
Return to the trader

While I'm waiting for my group, I should return to the trader. It wouldn't hurt to find out more about the Army Warehouses and tell him about the bad news while I'm at it — no one's going to pay him back anymore.
LOCAL TRADER
Talk to the trader
I still haven't stopped by to see the local trader. I should find out more about these areas, as all traces of professor Dubinin disappeared with Thermite.
REST
Sleep for a few hours
I've been on my legs for several days straight. While my squad is heading to the Army Warehouses, I should rest up a bit.
INTERCEPTION PLAN
Go to the military base

We decided to intercept the unknown stalkers' signals to find out their location. To maximize the radius of the interception equipment, we need to find a high point, and the towers in the abandoned military base will do perfectly. We shouldn't forget about the trader's warnings regarding that area.
Talk to Sky
It seems we've found the right tower for setting up the equipment. I should talk to Sky.
Set up the equipment on the tower
We're in position. Now we need to set up the equipment on the tower and begin scanning.
Leave the military base
After setting up the equipment, we intercepted several signals. We should get out of the base ASAP and check the areas where the signals came from.
Talk to Sky about the data
What happened in the military base is now in the past. The objective of setting up the device was successful. I should now talk to Sky to find out what sort of data was received.
Follow the squad to the helicopter
We have a fix on a strong encrypted signal coming from the crashed helicopter. We should check that area.
Talk to Sky
Getting to the helicopter doesn't seem that easy. I should discuss this with Sky.
Ask the trader about the helicopter

We've discovered a hidden passage under the helicopter. On the other hand, powerful psy-emissions prevent us from getting there. We should find a way to get through it or find a different entrance. The trader Bison could tell us more.
Ask Sky about the stalker's location
The trader gave me the ID number of a PDA belonging to a certain stalker — he may be able to help us through the psy-emissions. Now I just have to find him. Sky should assist me.
Go to the stalker's signal
The stalker craftsman with info on the helicopter has been observed in the vicinity of the village. Local stalkers call this place Bloodsuckerwood.
Find out more about the psy-emissions from the stalker
I should find out more about the psy-emissions around the helicopter from the local stalker craftsman as soon as possible.
Assemble a psy-helm
To reach the helicopter, I have to assemble a psy-helm — or better yet, several of them — in order for me and the squad to investigate what's happening there.
Reach the unknown stalkers

I have everything necessary to get to the helicopter. Now I only have to find out what is concealed in that entryway in the cabin — it is more than likely where Thermite settled with his secret faction.
UNDERFLOOR PRISONER
Kill the bloodsuckers in the village
The stalker that I'm looking for got stuck inside a basement in one of the houses while escaping from bloodsuckers. I should clear out the area and go help the poor guy.
Kill the bloodsuckers in the village
The bloodsuckers are dead. I should now find a way to free the stalker stuck in the basement.
Find a ladder in the village
In order to free the handyman stalker, I need to find a ladder somewhere in the village.
Free the stalker
I found a ladder. Now I just have to free the stalker from the basement.
Bring Marmot to a transformer

Some strange anomaly appeared in the village. Vehicles that were left here by local inhabitants back in 1986 started working again all of a sudden. The village appeared to be inhabitable once again, although its new inhabitants turned out not to be stalkers but bloodsuckers. A stalker called Marmot is trying to puzzle out the nature of this anomaly. I should help him in order for him to help me.
Talk to Marmot
It seems Marmot found some sort of artifact, and it must be what he came here for in the first place. I should discuss our next move with him.
PSY-HELM
Go to the military base with Marmot

Marmot agreed to help me assemble a psy-helm that should offer protection against the psy-emissions around the helicopter. In order to assemble it, however, we need to find the right components. They might be present in the abandoned military base... but will its residents welcome any visitors?
Get into the warehouse
I should get to the warehouse and comb it for the components necessary to piece together a psy-helm.
Give the storekeeper vodka
The warehouse entrance is locked, and its storekeeper's spirit is grumbling over not having any drink. I should try giving him some vodka, as breaking the door down won't be an easy task.
Cover Marmot
I should stay with Marmot while he cleans out the warehouse. While we're at it, I'll look for something I can use too.
Talk to Marmot
We've stripped the warehouse bare. I should ask Marmot whether we can go back.
Return with Marmot to his hut
We've found all the necessary parts to assemble the helm... but, unfortunately, only for a single one. Now I only have to wait until Marmot assembles it.
Kill the attackers
Someone attacked us. Looks like Thermite's men. We have to deal with them, or else we're not getting out of here alive.
Wait until Marmot finishes up
We're almost done. Now I just have to wait until the technician assembles the helm.
AT THE TARGET
Go to the helicopter
The psy-helm has been assembled. Time to assemble the troops and move to the helicopter.
BACKUP
Hold the position by the helicopter
Zhuravlyov set off underground. Our current objective is to guard the entryway and watch for threats.
MALFUNCTION
Check the equipment in the military base
The equipment we set up on the tower in the military base abruptly stopped working. I should check what's going on.
